overview: Susie wakes up in the hospital after the riot at Jefferson's house in France. Meanwhile, Jefferson's rival Maxwell has gotten hold of the list of his workers, and is pushing him out to destroy his company.  Jefferson 3 is the final film in LH studios' iconic original trilogy Jefferson. Filmed over two months and in several locations, it is the most ambitious film LH studios has created and an epic ending to the Jefferson films.
title: Jefferson 3
